title: Pope Washes Feet of 12 Female Convicts in Rome on Maundy Thursday - Kompas.id
text: [›](/) [English](/kategori/english)›Pope Washes Feet of 12 Female ... Pope Washes Feet of 12 Female Convicts in Rome on Maundy Thursday Throughout his mission, Pope Francis has given more space to women. This foot washing is specifically for women. About AI Translated Article Please note that this article was automatically translated using Microsoft Azure AI, Open AI, and Google Translation AI. We cannot ensure that the entire content is translated accurately. If you spot any errors or inconsistencies, contact us at [hotline@kompas.id](mailto:hotline@kompas.id), and we'll make every effort to address them. Thank you for your understanding. ROME, FRIDAY — Catholic leader [Pope Francis](https://www.kompas.id/label/paus-fransiskus?open_from=automate_body_url) washed and kissed the feet of 12 female inmates in a prison in Rome, Italy, Thursday (28/3/2024). This is part of the ritual [Maundy Thursday](https://www.kompas.id/label/kamis-putih?open_from=automate_body_url) in a series of Holy Triad ceremonies carried out by the Pope to emphasize and provide an example of his totality and humility in serving the people.
